title: Login Error
body: I cant seem to login. Cant receive a response from the server. My internet is fine and i tried switching computers. Please help

replies.body: This error message as well as getting stuck at champion select may be due to connection issues with your network trying to reach our server.  If you are still experiencing issues staying connected, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Funny thing is....I got a leaverbuster when it's clearly not my fault to leave the game on purpose.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I may or may not have just bit the dust in saying I wasn't penalized. FeelsBadMan. I get into champ select, and everybody disconnects at the very end of it for some reason, and the timer is stuck at 0 :(

EDIT: Nope, I can join the game in progress :D
I think it's back up. I just got in after a 1 person login queue.
You're not the only one here. Seem like alot of us having  log-in error issue. I was in the middle of a game!
